Literasee: Assessment Literacy Content Development via R

Assessment Literacy for R.

Details

Package:
Literasee
Type:
Package
Version:
0.0-0.6
Date:
2017-5-12
License:
GPL-3
LazyLoad:
yes

Literasee is an experimental package for the R software environment designed to ease in the creation of assessment literacy related content.

References

Betebenner, D. W. (2009). Norm- and criterion-referenced student growth. Educational Measurement: Issues and Practice, 28(4):42-51.

Author

Damian W. Betebenner dbetebenner@nciea.org and Adam Van Iwaarden avaniwaarden@gmail.com

Literasee is developed by the Center for Assessment.

Developed by Damian W. Betebenner, Adam R. Van Iwaarden.
